DOC.brief_summary: This study focuses on collecting and analyzing quantitative data related to adherence to antiretroviral treatment from patients in Dali, China, over a one-year time-frame and generating preliminary data on an intervention designed to improve adherence to antiretroviral treatment among the study population.
DOC.criteria: Patients who are 18 years of age and above, currently on antiretroviral treatment or about to begin it, live in the study catchment area, and are willing to provide informed consent. Persons below the age of 18 years, persons who are not currently on or about to start antiretroviral treatment, persons who live outside the study catchment area, or person not willing to provide informed consent.
DOC.keyword: HIV antiretroviral treatment adherence intervention China
